name: Tropical
description:
Tropical is one of the very first virtual worlds created for the general public. This small exotic aquapark is a completely new experience. You don't need to worry about weather, food, temperature, animals - every single aspect of your holidays is simulated to be perfect.

  • Discover thrilling story where every action you make has consequences
  • Explore virtual world full of details and interaction
  • Make friends with other people who have vacations with you
  • There’s so much to do! Waterslides, scooters, swimming pool, football, minigolf…

Or just relax near Lagoon. You’re on holiday after all!
